attributes.action: Resign on the grounds of total incompetance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You are obviously incapable of running the country in the interests and wellbeing of the native population of Britain. We the undersigned demand an immediate general election.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Decision2008/#detail
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
